body_html: Sadly I ran into a little problem with number 2: lots of the test code thinks that you can create empty teams. After I changed the minimum requirement to at least 1 team member, 43 tests failed. I tried to start to fix them, but it will take me at least 2 days to fix that everywhere. I would vote to skip number two and just do the first thing. Would that be okay? Empty teams can't apply anyway...
